paper.title: Making the difference: a subtraction operation for description logics

author.org: Institut für Informatik, TU München 80290 München, Germany

paper.venue: Principles of Knowledge Representation and Reasoning
paper.abstract: Abstract We define a new operation in description logics, the difference operation or subtraction operation. This operation allows to remove from a description as much as possible of the information contained in another description. We define the operation independently of a specific description logic. Then we consider its implementation in several specific logics. Finally we describe practical applications of the operation.
